data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Hold your applause ‚ùåüëè
cards.text: We haven‚Äôt reached the finish line yet üèÉ The COVID-19 pandemic is still ongoing and we have the power to protect ourselves and the ones we love.
cards.fact:
People across Canada are still testing positive for COVID-19 every day. 
 We still go through periods of decline, increase, and stability in the amount of new COVID-19 infections and deaths.
 While numbers are not as high as they were at the height of the pandemic, it is still possible to get sick.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: OOTD: üò∑üéΩüëñüëüüëì
cards.text: It‚Äôs still normal to wear a mask in public places. Don‚Äôt assume or judge when you see others adding a mask to their outfit.
cards.fact:
Mask use is still recommended by the Canadian government, especially in public indoor settings, group living situations like retirement homes, and in crowded or poorly ventilated areas. 
 While mask use is a personal choice, it's important to be respectful of other people‚Äôs decisions.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Be an immunity influencer ü§≥
cards.text: Youth play a key role in sharing COVID-19 information. When you post, you could be the reason someone boosts their health.
cards.fact:
Almost 60% of Gen Z and Millenials are very aware of fake news surrounding COVID-19, and around 44% are willing to share scientific information on social media.
  By sharing on social media, youth can be key in disseminating accurate and encouraging information about booster shots.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Community = Immunity üåéüí™
cards.text: Young people could lead the charge in normalizing booster shots. They have the power to influence and make a difference in the lives of those around them!
cards.fact:
Many people experienced vaccine hesitancy as vaccines rolled out in 2021 and 2022. 
 Sharing the facts with hesitant friends encourages them to get their vacinations and any needed boosters.
 These conversations are worth having with the people we care about because we value their health.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Boost your health, boost your confidence üöÄ
cards.text: When you get your booster shot, you can be confident that your physical and mental health is protected.
cards.fact:
People who are vaccinated are 13% less anxious and 17% less depressed than those who are not. 
 Being protected against COVID-19 helps your mental health.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: What time is it? Shot-o-clocküíâü§™
cards.text: A night out is better when you have your booster shot because you know you‚Äôre less likely to contract COVID-19.
cards.fact:
Protection can wane over time after your primary series of vaccinations. 
 To be completely up to date on your vaccinations, you need to get a booster shot every 6 months, and perhaps even more often if you are immunocompromised.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: From busted ü§¶ to boosted üíÅ
cards.text: Dont let your friends be busted. Remind them to get their booster shot every 6 months, as immunity wears off over time.
cards.fact:
Around 80% of young Canadians have had their primary series of vaccinations completed, but less than 10% have received a booster shot in the last 6 months.
  Remind your friends to get their booster shots.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Caught in 4K üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Call your friends out if they haven‚Äôt gotten their booster shot in the past 6 months, as vaccine immunity wears off over time.
cards.fact:
It‚Äôs easy to plan to get your booster shot every 6 months. If your friends haven‚Äôt gotten theirs, show them how simple it is to book an appointment.
 You only need your personal information, your health card, and your primary vaccines completed.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Nerf the virus, buff your immunity üéÆ
cards.text: Destroy the virus! After getting COVID-19, a booster shot can give you even more immunity.
cards.fact:
After recovering from Covid-19, you have a window of immunity.
 However, getting a booster shot after recovering from the virus provides even more added protection.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Don‚Äôt go back to your respawn point üëæüéÆ
cards.text: When you don‚Äôt get your booster shot every 6 months, you become more vulnerable to contracting COVID-19. Don‚Äôt go back!
cards.fact:
The immunity you receive from your original vaccine doses wears off over time. 
 To continue to have a higher level of immunity against testing positive for COVID-19, a booster shot is needed every 6 months. 
 Your booster shot also protects you from more severe symptoms if you do contract COVID-19.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Boost the house down üë¢
cards.text: Serve boosted baddie realness by getting your booster shot every 6 months. Keep it fierce.
cards.fact:
You can boost your immunity and protect yourself from severe COVID-19 symptoms by getting your booster shot every 6 months.
 When your chance of contracting COVID-19 lowers with a booster shot, you can go out and be your confident, amazing self.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Condoms, PrEP, and booster shots: Be the total package üì¶
cards.text: Condoms, PrEP, and booster shots are part of a package deal of protection that improves your sexual and physical health.
cards.fact:
Condoms help prevent the spread of STIs. Taking PrEP stops you from contracting HIV. Used together or separately, these STI prevention methods protect your sexual health. 
 Getting a booster shot every 6 months also benefits your health, as it raises your immunity against COVID-19. 
 If you are taking PrEP, there is no evidence that your COVID-19 booster shot will interact with PrEP.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Don't get laxed if not fully vaxxed üíâ
cards.text: Booster shots can help increase immunity and restore protection from original vaccine doses that may have decreased over time.
cards.fact:
Immunity from your primary doses wears off over time. 
 Getting a booster shot every 6 months boosts your immunity and makes it less likely to contract COVID-19.

Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: O seka wa itumela pele ‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Ga re ise re goroge. Segajaja sa covid-19 se santse se tsweletse, re na le bokgoni ja go itshireletsa le go sireletsa ba re ba ratang
cards.fact:
Batho mo Canada ba santse ba tshwarwa ka mogare wa covid-19 malatsi otlhe. Re santse re  le mo dinakong tsa phokotsego, go ya ko godimo, le dipalo tsa dikgetsi tse disha di santse di laolesega.
Le fa dipalo di se ko godimo jaaka di ne di le ko godimo ka nako ya bolwetse bo ile magoletsa, go santse go na le kgonagalo ya go lwala.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: Kapari ya letsatsi leo: üò∑üéΩüëñüëüüëì
cards.text: Go santse go tlwaelesegile go rwala sebipa nko le molomo kgotsa mmaseke mo mafelong a sechaba. O seka wa hakgamala kgotsa wa bona go sa siama fa o bona ba bangwe tsenya mmaseke e le bontlha bongwe ja kapari ya bone
cards.fact:
Tiriso ya mmaseke e santse e rotloediwa ke puso ya Canada, bogolo jang mo mafelong a  sechaba a a tswalegileng, fa batho ba nnang ba kgobokane teng, jaaka mafelo a bagodi, le mo mafelong a batho ba leng bantsi kgotsa a a senang phefo e e lekaneng.
Le fa tiriso ya mmaseke e le maitlhophelo a  motho ka bo ene, go botlhokwa go tlotla ditshwetso tsa batho ba bangwe.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Nna morotloetsi wa itshireletso ü§≥
cards.text: Banana ba tsaya karolo e tona mabapi le go kgaogana kgotsa go abelana kitso ya COVID-19. Fa o posa sengwe, o ka nna lebaka la gore mongwe a nonotshe itshireletso ya gagwe.
cards.fact:
Selekanyo sa masome a marataro mo lekgolong(60%) sa batho ba ba tshotsweng ka dingwaga tsa bo 1980 di simologa  le tsa ko bofelong ja bo 1990 ba itse ka dikgang tse e seng tsa nnete mabapi le covid-19, le gore 44% ba na le keletso ya go kgaogana kitso ya boitsaanape mo maranyaneng.
 Ka go kgaogana kitso mo maranyaneng, banana e ka nna bone ba ba eteletseng pele go anamisa molaetsa wa boammaaruri le go rotloetsa kitso mabapi le mekento ya tlaleletso

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Morafe = itshireletso üåéüí™
cards.text: Banana e ka nna bone ba gogang kgotsa ba etelela pele tlwaelo ya go tsaya mekento ya tlaleletso. Ba na le bokgoni ja go rotloetsa le go dira pharologanyo mo matshelonga ba ba tshelang nabo!
cards.fact:
Batho ka bontsi ba itemogetse go tshaba go tsaya mekento fa e ne e anamisiwa ka ngwaga wa 2021 le wa 2022.
Go amogana kitso ya nnete le ditsala tse di tshabang go ka ba rotloetsa go tsaya mekento ya bone le epe e mengwe ya tlaleletso e e tlhokafalang
Dipuisano tsa mofuta o di botlhokwa go tshwarwa le batho ba re ba ratang ka gore re kgatlhala ka botsogo ja bone

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Nonotsha botsogo ja gago, tokafatsa boleng ja gago kgotsa ka fa o ikutlwang ka teng üöÄ.
cards.text: Fa o tsaya mokento wa gago wa tlaleletso, o ka tshepha gore botsogo ja gago ja mmele le ja tlhaloganyo bo babalesegile kgotsa bo sireletsegile.
cards.fact: Batho ba ba kentilweng ba na le selekanyo sa 13% ba sa tlhobaele le 17% maikutlo a bone a sa wele ko tlase jaaka ba ba sa kentiwang.Go sirelediwa kgatlhanong le COVID-19 go thusa botsogo ja gago ja tlhaloganyo

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Ke nako mang? Ke nako ya mokento! üíâü§™
cards.text: Go ya maitisong bosigo go botoka fa o tsere mokento wa gago wa tlaleletso ka gore o itse gore kgonagalo ya gore o tsenwe ke COVID-19 e ko tlase
cards.fact:
Tshireletsego e a fokotsega fa nako e ntse e tsamaya fa o sena go tsaya mekento ya gago ya ntlha.
Gore mekento ya gago e nne e le mo dinakong, o tshwanetse go tsaya mokento wa tlaleletso kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe, kgotsa go feta fa itshireletso mmele ya gago e le bokoa.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Go tswa mo go thubegeng go ya ko nonofong üíÅ
cards.text: O seka wa tlogela ditsala tsa gago di thubega. Ba gakolole go tsaya mekento ya bone ya tlaleletso kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe, ka gore itshireletso e a fokotsega fa nako e ntse e tsamaya
cards.fact:
Banana ba Canada ba ka tshwara masome a ferabobedi mo lekgolong(80%) ba weditse mekento ya bone ya ntlha, mme ko tlase ga lesome mo lekgolong(10%) ba tsere mokento wa tlaleletso mo kgweding tse thataro tse di fetileng.
Gakolola ditsala tsa gago go tsaya mekento ya bone ya tlaleletso

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Sekapa ditshwantsho se go senotse o dira singwe se se sa siamang üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Bitsa ditsala tsa gago fa ba ise ba tseye mokento wa bone wa tlaleletso mo kgweding tse thataro tse di fetileng, ka gore itshireletso ya mokento e a fokotsega fa nako e ntse e tsamaya.
cards.fact: Go motlhofo go rulaganya go tsaya mokento wa gago wa tlaleletso kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe. Fa ditsala tsa gago di ise di tseye wa bone, ba supegetse ka fa go leng motlhofo ka teng go rulaganya loeto kgotsa bokopano ja go nna jalo

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Koafatsa mogare, nonotsha itshireletso mmele wa gago üéÆ
cards.text: Fedisa mogare! Fa o sena go tsenwa ke COVID-19, mokento wa tlaleletso o ka oketsa itshireletso ya gago le go feta.
cards.fact:
Fa o sena go fola Covid-19, o nna le sebaka sa itshireletso
Le fa gontse jalo, go tsaya mokento wa itshireletso fa o sena go tokafala go go fa tshireletsego e e oketsegileng.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: O seka wa boela ko seemong sa gago sa pele üëæüéÆ
cards.text: Fa o sa tseye mokento wa gago wa tlaleletso kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe, o tshabelelwa ke go tsenwa ke COVID-19. O seka wa boela ko morago!
cards.fact:
Itshireletso e o e bonang go tswa mo mekentong ya gago ya ntlha e a fokotsega fa nako e ntse e tsamaya.
Gore o  tswelele o na le seemo se se ko godimo sa itshireletso kgatlhanong le go fitlhelwa ka COVID-19, mokento wa tlaleletso o a tlhokafala kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe.
Mokento wa tlaleletso o go sireletsa gore o seka wa nna le dikai tse di bogale fa o ka tsenwa ke COVID-19.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Dira sengwe se se kgatlhang kgotsa se se pharologanyo! üë¢
cards.text: Supa gore o lekgarebe ka go tsaya mokento wa gago kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe. Supa gore go boammaaruri ebile o dumela mo go one.
cards.fact:
O ka nonotsha itshireletso ya gago le go itshireletsa mo dikaing tsa COVID-19 tse di bogale ka go tsaya mokento wa tlaleletso kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe.
Fa kgonagalo ya gore o tsenwe ke COVID-19 e fokotsega ka mokento wa tlaleletso, o ka tswela kontle le go nna matlhagatlhaga, o ikutlwa gore ke wena tota.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Dikhondomo, kalafi e e thibelang go tsenwa ke mogare wa HIV ya PrEP, le mekento ya tlaleletso: Ke kgetsi ya mofago o o feletseng. üì¶
cards.text: Dikhondomo, kalafi e e thibelang go tsenwa ke mogare wa HIV ya PrEP, le mekento ya tlaleletso ke mophuthelwana o o siameng wa itshireletso o o tokafatsang botsogo ja gago ja mmele le tlhakanelo dikobo.
cards.fact:
Dikhondomo di thusa go thibela go anama ga malwetse a tlhakanelo dikobo. Go tsaya kalafi ya PrEP go kganela gore o seka wa tsenwa ke HIV. Fa di dirisiwa mmogo kgotsa di farologane, mefuta e ya thibelo malwetse a tlhakanelo dikobo e sireletsa botsogo ja gago ja tlhakanelo dikobo.
Fa o tsaya PrEP, ga gona bosupi ja gore mokento wa gago wa COVID-19 wa tlaleletso o tla amana le PrEP

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: O seka wa itebala fa o sa wetsa mekento ya gago yotlhe üíâ
cards.text: Mekento ya tlaleletso e ka thusa go oketsa itshireletso ya gago le go busetsa tshireletso go tswa mo mekentong ya gago ya ntlha e e ka tswang e fokotsegile fa nako e ntse e tsamaya.
cards.fact:
Itshireletso go tswa mo mekentong ya gago ya ntlha e a fokotsega fa nako e ntse e tsamaya.
Go tsaya mokento wa tlaleletso kgwedi tse thataro dingwe le dingwe go nonotsha itshireletso ya gago le gore o seka wa tsenwa ke COVID-19 motlhofo.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Shikilia furaha yako ‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Bado hatujafika tamati üèÉjanga la COVID-19 bado linaendelea na tuna uwezo wa kujilinda sisi wenyewe na wale tunaowapenda.
cards.fact:
Watu kote Kanada bado wanapimwa na kupatikana kuwa na COVID-19 kila siku. Bado tunapitia vipindi vya kupungua, kuongezeka na uthabiti katika idadi ya maambukizi mapya ya  COVID-19 na vifo. 
Ingawa idadi sio kubwa kama ilivyokuwa kwenye kilele cha janga, bado kuna uwezo wa kuugua ama kugonjeka.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: Mavazi ya siku: üò∑üéΩüëñüëüüëì
cards.text: Bado ni jambo la kawaida kuvaa barakoa katika maeneo ya umma. Usifikirie au kuwachukua vibaya ukiwaona wengine wakiongeza barakoa kwenye mavazi yao.
cards.fact:
Utumiaji wa barakoa bado unapendekezwa na serikali ya Kanada, haswa katika mazingira ya ndani kwenye umma, hali ya maisha ya kikundi kama nyumba za kustaafu, na katika maeneo yenye watu wengi au yasiyo na hewa ya kutosha. 
Ingawa matumizi ya barakoa ni chaguo la kibinafsi, ni muhimu kuheshimu maamuzi ya watu wengine.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Kuwa mshawishi wa kuhakikisha kinga ü§≥
cards.text: Vijana wana jukumu muhimu katika kushiriki ama kuwasilisha habari za COVID-19. Unapochapisha ama kuweka ujumbe kwenye mtandao, unaweza kuwa sababu ya mtu mwengine kuimarisha afya yake.
cards.fact:
Karibu takriban 60% ya Gen Z na Millenials wanafahamu sana habari za uwongo zinahusu COVID-19, na karibu 44% wako tayari kushiriki ama kuwasilisha habari za kisayansi kwenye mitandao za kijamii.
 Kwa kushiriki ama kuwasilisha ujumbe hizi kwenye mitandao za kijamii, vijana wanaweza kuwa muhimu katika kusambaza taarifa sahihi na za kutia moyo kuhusu chanjo za nyongeza.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Jumuiya = Kinga üåéüí™
cards.text: Vijana wanaweza kuongoza jukumu la kuhakikisha kuwa wamerekebisha tabia ya kupokea chanjo za nyongeza kuwa jambo la kawaida. Wana uwezo wa kushawishi na kuleta mabadiliko katika maisha ya wale wanaowazunguka ama waliokaribu nao!
cards.fact:
Watu wengi walikumbana na kusitasita kwa chanjo wakati chanjo ilipotolewa mwaka wa 2021 na 2022. 
Kushiriki ama kuwaelezea ukweli wa mambo na marafiki wanaositasita kunawahimiza kupata chanjo zao na chanjo zozote za nyongeza zinazohitajika. 
Mazungumzo haya yanafaa kuwa na watu tunaowajali kwa sababu tunathamini afya zao.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Imarisha afya yako, ongeza ujasiri wako üöÄ
cards.text: Unapopata chanjo yako ya nyongeza, unaweza kuwa na uhakika kwamba afya yako ya kimwili na kiakili inalindwa.
cards.fact:
Watu ambao wamechanjwa wana wasiwasi mdogo sana kwa 13% na 17% chini ya huzuni kuliko wale ambao hawajapata. 
Kulindwa dhidi ya COVID-19 husaidia afya yako ya kiakili.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Ni saa ngapi? Ni saa ya kupata chanjo üíâü§™
cards.text: Usiku wa matembezi ni bora zaidi ukiwa umepata chanjo yako kwa sababu unajua kuna uwezekano mdogo wa kuambukizwa COVID-19.
cards.fact:
Ulinzi unaweza kupungua baada ya muda baada ya mfululizo wako wa chanjo ya msingi.
 Ili uwe wa kisasa kabisa na chanjo zako, unahitaji kupata chanjo yako ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6, na labda hata mara nyingi zaidi ikiwa huna kinga.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Kutoka busted ü§¶hadi chanjo iliyoboreshwa üíÅ
cards.text: Usiruhusu marafiki zako wachekwe au waruhusiwe. Wakumbushe kupata chanjo yao ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6, kwani kinga hupungua kadri muda unavyopita.
cards.fact:
Takriban 80% ya vijana wa Kanada wamekamilisha kupata mfululizo wa chanjo zao, lakini chini ya 10% wamepokea chanjo ya nyongeza katika miezi 6 iliyopita. 
Wakumbushe marafiki zako kupata chanjo yao ya nyongeza.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Imepatikana katika 4K üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Waite marafiki zako ikiwa hawajapata chanjo zao ya ngongeza katika muda wa miezi 6 iliyopita, kwani kinga ya chanjo hupungua kadri muda unavyopita.
cards.fact:
Ni rahisi kupanga kupata chanjo yako ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6. Ikiwa marafiki zako hawajapata zao, waonyeshe jinsi ilivyo rahisi kuweka miadi. 
Unahitaji tu maelezo yako ya kibinafsi, kadi yako ya afya, na chanjo zako za kimsingi ulizopata.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Nerf virusi, buff kinga yako üéÆ
cards.text: Angamizeni virusi! Baada ya kupta COVID-19, chanjo ya nyongeza inaweza kukupa kinga hata zaidi.
cards.fact:
Baada ya kupona kutoka kwa Covid-19, una kinga.
Hata hivyo, kupata chanjo ya nyongeza baada ya kupona kutoka kwa virusi hutoa ulinzi zaidi.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Usirudi kwenye eneo lako la hatari üëæüéÆ
cards.text: Usipopata chanjo yako ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6, unakuwa katika hatari zaidi ya kuambukizwa COVID-19. Usirudi nyuma!
cards.fact:
Kinga unayopokea kutoka kwa chanjo yako za awali, huisha baada ya muda.
Ili kuendelea kuwa na kiwango cha juu cha kinga dhidi ya kuambukizwa COVID-19, unafaa upate chanjo ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6.
 Chanjo yako ya nyongeza pia hukulinda dhidi ua dalili kali zaidi ikiwa utaambukizwa COVID-19.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Imarisha hali ya familia yako üë¢
cards.text: Kuwa mmoja wa wale watu au baddie wa halisi kwa kupata chanjo yako ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6. Weka mkali.
cards.fact:
Unaweza kuongeza kinga yako na kujikinga dhidi ya dalili kali za COVID-19 kwa kupata chanjo yako ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6. 
Wakati nafasi yako ya kuambukizwa COVID-19 inapungua kwa chanjo ya nyongeza, unaweza kwenda nje na kuwa mtu wa kujiamini na wa kushangaza.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Mpira wa kujikinga (Kondomu), PrEP, na chanjo ya nyongeza: Kuwa jumla ya kifurushi  üì¶
cards.text: Mpira wa kujikinga, PrEP na chanjo ya nyongeza ni baadhi au sehemu ya mpango wa ulinzi unaoboresha afya yako ya ngono na kimwili.
cards.fact:
Mpira wa kujikinga husaidia kuzuia kuenea kwa magonjwa ya zinaa (STIs). Kuchukua PrEP kunakuzuia kuambukizwa virusi vya ukimwi. Zikitumiwa pamoja au kando, njia hizi za kuzuia magonjwa ya zinaa hulinda afya yako ya ngono. 
Kupata chanjo ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6 pia hunufaisha afya yako, kwani huongeza kinga yako dhidi ya COVID-19. 
Ikiwa unatumia PrEP, hakuna ushahidi kwamba chanjo yako ya nyongeza cha COVID-19 kitaingiliana na PrEP.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Usilegee ikiwa haujapata kinga kikamilifuüíâ
cards.text: Chanjo ya nyongeza zinaweza kusaidia kuongeza kinga na kurejesha ulinzi dhidi ya asili ya chanjo za awali ambazo huenda zilipungua baada ya muda.
cards.fact:
Kinga kutoka kwa chanjo yako ya awali au ya kimsingi huisha baada ya muda. 
Kupata chanjo ya nyongeza kila baada ya miezi 6 huongeza kinga yako na hufanya uwezekano mdogo wa kuambukizwa COVID-19.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo

cards.text: Todav√≠a es normal usar un tapa bocas en lugares p√∫blicos. No asumas ni juzgues cuando ves a otros a√±adiendo un tapa bocas a su outfit.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis

cards.text: Los j√≥venes juegan un papel clave en el intercambio de informaci√≥n de COVID-19. Cuando publicas, puedes ser la raz√≥n por la que alguien refuerza su salud.
cards.fact:
Casi el 60% de la Generaci√≥n Z y Millenials son muy conscientes de las noticias falsas que rodean a COVID-19, y alrededor del 44% est√°n dispuestos a compartir informaci√≥n cient√≠fica en las redes sociales.
Al compartir en las redes sociales, los j√≥venes pueden ser clave para difundir informaci√≥n precisa y alentadora sobre las vacunas de refuerzo.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Comunidad = Inmunidad üåéüí™
cards.text: Los j√≥venes podr√≠an liderar la carga en la normalizaci√≥n de las vacunas de refuerzo. ¬°Tienen el poder de influir y hacer una diferencia en las vidas de aquellos a su alrededor!
cards.fact:
Muchas personas experimentaron dudas con respecto a las vacunas cuando se lanzaron en 2021 y 2022.
Compartir los hechos con amigos indecisos los alienta a recibir sus vacunas y cualquier refuerzo necesario.
Estas conversaciones valen la pena con las personas que nos importan porque valoramos su salud.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed

cards.text: Cuando reciba su vacuna de refuerzo, puede estar seguro de que su salud f√≠sica y mental est√° protegida.
cards.fact:
Las personas que est√°n vacunadas son un 13% menos ansiosas y un 17% menos deprimidas que las que no lo est√°n.
Estar protegido contra COVID-19 ayuda a su salud mental.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: ¬øQu√© tomas? Me tomo la vacuna üíâü§™
cards.text: Una noche de fiesta es mejor cuando tiene su vacuna de refuerzo porque usted sabe que es menos probable que contraiga COVID-19.
cards.fact:

Para estar completamente al d√≠a sobre sus vacunas, necesita recibir una vacuna de refuerzo cada 6 meses, y tal vez a√∫n m√°s a menudo si est√° inmunocomprometido.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk

cards.text: No deje que sus amigos sean expuestos. Recu√©rdeles que se vacunen cada 6 meses, ya que la inmunidad desaparece con el tiempo.
cards.fact:
Alrededor del 80% de los j√≥venes canadienses han completado su primera serie de vacunas, pero menos del 10% han recibido una vacuna de refuerzo en los √∫ltimos 6 meses.
Recu√©rdales a tus amigos que se pongan sus vacunas de refuerzo.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Atrapado üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Llama a tus amigos si no han recibido su vacuna de refuerzo en los √∫ltimos 6 meses, ya que la inmunidad de la vacuna desaparece con el tiempo.
cards.fact:
Es f√°cil planificar una vacuna de refuerzo cada 6 meses. Si tus amigos no han recibido la suya, demu√©strales lo sencillo que es hacer una cita.
 Solo necesita completar su informaci√≥n personal, su tarjeta de salud y sus primeras vacunas.

Despu√©s de recuperarse de Covid-19, tiene una ventana de inmunidad.
 Sin embargo, recibir una vacuna de refuerzo despu√©s de recuperarse del virus proporciona a√∫n m√°s protelocationi√≥n.

cards.text: Cuando no recibe su vacuna de refuerzo cada 6 meses, se vuelve m√°s vulnerable a contraer COVID-19. ¬°No regrese!
cards.fact:
La inmunidad que recibe de las dosis originales de la vacuna desaparece con el tiempo.

cards.fact:
Usted puede aumentar su inmunidad y protegerse de los s√≠ntomas graves de COVID-19 al recibir su vacuna de refuerzo cada 6 meses.
Cuando su posibilidad de contraer COVID-19 baja con una inyelocationi√≥n de refuerzo, puede salir ser segura y asombrosa.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Condones, PrEP y vacunas de refuerzo: Sea el paquete total üì¶
cards.text: Los condones, PrEP y las vacunas de refuerzo son parte de un paquete de protelocationi√≥n que mejora su salud sexual y f√≠sica.
cards.fact:
Los condones ayudan a prevenir la propagaci√≥n de las ITS. Tomar PrEP evita que contraigas el VIH. Utilizados juntos o por separado, estos m√©todos de prevenci√≥n de ITS protegen su salud sexual.

cards.text: Las inyelocationiones de refuerzo pueden ayudar a aumentar la inmunidad y restaurar la protelocationi√≥n de las dosis originales de la vacuna que pueden haber disminuido con el tiempo.
cards.fact:
La inmunidad de sus dosis primarias desaparece con el tiempo.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Niente applausi, non ancora.‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Non abbiamo ancora raggiunto il traguardo. La pandemia COVID-19 e' ancora qui e abbiamo il potere di proteggere noi stessi e le persone che amiamo.
cards.fact:
Tante persone in Canada risultano positive al COVID-19 ancora oggi.
 Abbiamo periodi di declino, pilocationo e stabilita' per quanto riguarda il numero di infezioni e morti per COVID-19.
Mentre il numero di infezioni non e' cosi alto come lo era durante il pilocationo della pandemia, e' ancora possibile ammalarsi.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: Outfit del giorno: üò∑üéΩüëñüëüüëì
cards.text: E' assolutamente normale indossare la mascherina in posti pubblici. Non aver paura di essere giudicato e non giudicare altri se decidono di indossarla.
cards.fact:
L'uso della mascherina e' ancora consigliato dal governo Canadase, soprattutto in posti pubblici, case di riposo e zone affollate o poco ventilate.
Mentre l'uso della mascherina e' una scelta personale, bisogna sempre essere rispettosi delle scelte degli altri.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Prova ad essere un influencer di immunita'.ü§≥
cards.text: I giovani hanno un ruolo chiave nel condividere informazioni riguardanti COVID-19. Quando usi i social media, potresti essere la ragione per la quale altri migliorano la propria salute.
cards.fact:
Quasi il 60% delle Generazioni Z e Millenials sono consapevoli della disinformazione riguardante COVID-19 e circa il 44% di loro sono disponibili a rilasciare informazioni scientifiche sui social media. 
Usando i social media, i giovani potrebbero essere la chiave del diffondersi di informazioni esatte e incoraggianti riguardanti il richiamo del valocationino.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Comunita'=Immunita'üåéüí™
cards.text: I giovani di oggi potrebbero guidare la normalizzazione dei richiami del vaccino. Hanno il potere di influenzare e fare la differenza nelle vite di coloro che li circondano.
cards.fact:
In tanti sono stati scettici riguardo i vaccini rilasciati nel 2021 e 2022.
Condividendo i dati con conoscenti ed amici esistanti, li si spinge ad ottenere il vaccino e gli eventuali richiami.
Vale sempre la pena avere questo tipo di conversazioni con le persone alle quale teniamo perche' abbiamo a cuore la loro salute.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Aumenta la tua salute, aumenta la tua sicurezza.üöÄ
cards.text: Quando fai la dose di richiamo, puoi star sicuro che la tua salute mentale e fisica e' protetta.
cards.fact:
Le persone che sono vaccinate sono il 13% meno ansiose ed il 17% meno depresse di quelle che non lo sono.
Essere protetti contro il COVID-19 aiuta la tua salute mentale.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Che ora e'? E' l'ora del vaccino.üíâü§™
cards.text: Una serata con gli amici diventa migliore quando hai il tuo richiamo perche' sai che sei hai meno possibilita' di contrarre il COVID-19.
cards.fact:
La protezione contro COVID-19  puo' diminuire nel tempo dopo la prima serie di vaccini.
 Per essere sempre aggiornato con i vaccini, c'e' bisogno di fare richiamo ogni 6 mesi e, forse, anche di pi√π se si e' immunocompromessi.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Da belocationato a potenziato.üíÅ
cards.text: Non lasciare che i tuoi amici siano belocationati. Ricorda loro di fare il richiamo ogni 6 mesi visto la immunita' diminuisce nel tempo.
cards.fact: Circa l'80% dei giovani Canadesi ha la prima serie di vaccinazioni completa but meno del 10% ha ricevuto il richiamo negli ultimi 6 mesi.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Belocationato in 4K.üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Ricorda ai tuoi amici che non hanno fatto il richiamo del vaccino negli ultimi 6 mesi che l'immunita' diminuisce nel tempo.
cards.fact:
E' facile organizzarsi per ottenere il richiamo ogni 6 mesi. Se i tuoi amici ancora non lo hanno fatto, mostragli come e' semplice prenotare un appuntamento.
Hai bisogno solo di: informazioni personali, tessera sanitaria e la prima serie di valocationini completa.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Indebolisci il virus, potenzia la tua immunita'.üéÆ
cards.text: Distruggi il virus! Dopo essere stati infetti da COVID-19, il richiamo del vaccino puo' darti ancor piu' immunita'.
cards.fact:
Dopo essersi ripresi dal COVID-19, sei immune per un certo periodo.
Nonostante cio', fare il richiamo subito dopo aiuta nell'aggiungere ancor piu' protezione.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Non tornare indietro.üëæüéÆ
cards.text: Quando non fai il richiamo ogni 6 mesi, sei piu' vulnerabile nel contrarre COVID-19. Non tornare indietro!
cards.fact:
L'immunita' ricevuta con i primi vaccini diminuisce nel tempo.
 Per avere un alto livello di immunita' contro il COVID-19, il richiamo del vaccino e' necessario ogni 6 mesi.
Facendo il richiamo, si e' piu' protetti contro sintomi gravi del COVID-19 .

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Aumenta il vantaggio casalingo.üë¢
cards.text: Aumenta il tuo vantaggio casalingo facendo il richiamo del vaccino ogni 6 mesi. Fallo fieramente.
cards.fact:
Puoi aumentare la tua immunita' e proteggere te stesso da gravi sintomi del COVID-19 facendo il richiamo ogni 6 mesi.
 Se le possibilita' di contrarre COVID-19 diminuiscono grazie al richiamo, puoi uscire con amici e famiglia ed essere ancor piu' sicuro di te.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Profilattici, PrEP e richiami del vaccino: palocationhetto completo.üì¶
cards.text: Profilattici, PrEP e richiami del vaccino fanno parte del palocationhetto ideale di protezione che migliora la tua salute fisica e sessuale.
cards.fact:
I profilattici aiutano nel prevenire la diffusione di malattie sessuali. Prendere la PrEP ti aiuta nel non contrarre l'HIV. Puoi usarle allo stesso momento o separatamente. 
Ottenere il richiamo del vaccino ogni 6 mesi aiuta la tua salute, aumentando la tua immunita' contro il COVID-19.
Non esiste alcuna prova che dimostri che fare il richiamo del vaccino possa interagire negativamente se si sta assumendo la PrEp.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Non rilassarti se non sei vaccinato.üíâ
cards.text: Il richiamo del vaccino aumenta l'immunita' e ristabilisce la protezione ottenuta con il vaccino originale.
cards.fact:
L'immunita' ottenuta dalle dosi principali diminuisce nel tempo.
Fare il richiamo del vaccino ogni 6 mesi aumenta la tua immunita' e rende piu' difficile contrarre il COVID-19.

cards.text: Abavubuka bakola kinene mukusasanya amawulire agakwata ku lumiima mawuggwe. Bw‚Äôoteeka  kumukutu, oyinza okuba ngagwe nsonga lwaki omuntu yegemeseza okutaasa obulamu bwe

Kumpi ebitundu 60% ku Gen Z ne Millinials bamanyi nnyo amawulire ag‚Äôobulimba agakwata ku limiima mawuggwe, era nga 44% beetegefu okugabana amawulire ga ssaayansi ku mikutu gya yintaneeti.
Nga bagabana ku mikutu gya yintaneeti, abavubuka basobola okuba ekisumuluzo mu kubunyisa amawulire amatuufu era agazzaamu amaanyi agakwata kuddagala elitangiira Lumiima Mawuggwe.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Abantu=Okuziyiza Lumiima mawuggwe  üåéüí™
cards.text: Abavubuka bayinza okukulemberamu okwegemesa lumiima mawuggwe. Balina amaanyi okusikiriza n‚Äôokuleeta enjawulo mu bulamu bw‚Äôabo ababeetoolodde!

Abantu bangi baafuna okubuusabuusa ku kugema ng‚Äôokugema kutandika mu 2021 ne 2022.
Okugabana ebituffu n‚Äôemikwano egyibuusabuusa kibakubiriza okwegemesa  emirundi gyoona.
Ensoga zino zisaana ozigamba abantu be tufaako kubanga obulamu bwabwe tubutwala nga bwa muwendo.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Yongenza obulamu bwo, yongera okwekkiririzaamu üöÄ
cards.text: Bw‚Äôofuna doozi yokugema endala , osobola okuba omukakafu nti obulamu bwo obw‚Äôomubiri n‚Äôobwongo bukuumibwa.
cards.fact:
Abantu abagemebwa ebitundu 13% tebatera kweraliikirira ate 17% tebalina kiwuubaalo kyingi okusinga abo abatagemebwa.
Okubeera n‚Äôobukuumi ku Lumiima mawuggwe kiyamba obulamu bwo obw‚Äôomutwe.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Ssaawa mmeka? Ssaawa yakwegemyaüíâü§™
cards.text: Okutambulako ekiro kisingako ng‚Äôofunye doozi yo endala eyokwegemesa  kuba kikuyamba obutakwatibwa  Lumiima Mawuggwe.
cards.fact:
Obukuumi buyinza okukendeera okumala ekiseera oluvannyuma lw‚Äôokugema kwo okusookerwako.
Okusobola okubeera ku mulembe  ku kugema kwo, olina okufuna doozi endala eyokwegemya  buli luvannyuma lwa myezi 6, era mpozzi n‚Äôokusingawo singa oba obusimu obuziyiza endwadde butataganyizibwa.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Okuva ku kufuna ü§¶ okutuuka ku kuziyiza üíÅ
cards.text: Toleka mikwano gyo kukwatibwa. Bajjukize okufuna doozi endala eyokwegemesa buli luvannyuma lwa myezi 6, anti obusimu obuziyiza endwadde bukendeera nga wayiseewo ebanga.
cards.fact:
Ebitundu 80% ku bavubuka b‚Äôe Canada bamaze okugema kwabwe okusookerwako, naye abatakka wansi wa 10% bafunye doozi yabwe endala eyokwegemesa  mu myezi 6 egiyise.
Jjukiza mikwano gyo okufuna doozi yabwe endala eyokwegemesa.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Bakutte mu 4K üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Kubira mikwano gyo bwe baba nga tebafuna  doozi yabwe endala eyokwegemesa mu myezi 6 egiyise, anti abaserikale b‚Äôomubiri  bakendeera okumala ekiseera.
cards.fact:
Kyangu nyo ofuna doozi yo endala eyokwegemsa buli luvanyuma lwe myezi 6. Singa mikwano gyo tebafuna nga doozi zabwe, balage nti kyangu okulonda olukyaala lwo.
Kyewetaaga kyoka kubeera na bikwatako, ebbalawo eye ddwaliro, and bubaka obulaga nti wamalayo okugema okwasooka.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Nafuya a kawuka, oyongere obutafaali obuziyiza endwadde üéÆ
cards.text: Sanyaawo a kawuka! Ng'omaze okufuna LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE, okwegemesa doozi endala kyongera obutafaali obuziyiza endwadde.
cards.fact:
Oluvannyuma lw‚Äôokuwona LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE, olina a kaseera kokuba nga omubiri gwo guziyiza endwadde.
Wabula okufuna doozi endala eyokwegemesa  oluvannyuma lw‚Äôokuwona akawuka kano kikuwa obukuumi obw‚Äôenjawulo.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Todda mabega mukatiro üëæüéÆ
cards.text: Bwotofuna doozi yo ndala eyokwegemesa buli luvanyuma lwa myezi 6, emikisa gyokuddamu ofuna LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE gyiri wagulu.  Todda mabega!
cards.fact:
Obusimu obuziyiza endwadde bw‚Äôofuna okuva mu doozi z‚Äôokugema ezo ezasooka buggwaawo okumala ekiseera.
Okugenda mu maaso n‚Äôokubeera n‚Äôobusimu obuziyiza endwadde kisingako okukeberebwa ngolina LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE, kyetaagisa okugema omulundi omulala  buli luvannyuma lwa myezi 6.
Okukugema omulundi omulala kikukuuma obutafuna bubonero obw‚Äôamaanyi singa ofuna LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Yongeza Ensanyu Munyumba üë¢
cards.text: Beera omuntu owanamadala  ng'ofuna doozi yo endala eyokwegemesa  buli luvannyuma lwa myezi 6. Kikuume nga kyakabi.
cards.fact:
Osobola okwongeza abaserikale b‚Äôomubiri n‚Äôokwekuuma obubonero obw‚Äôamaanyi obwa LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE ng‚Äôofuna doozi endala eyokwegemesa buli luvannyuma lwe myezi 6.
 Omukisa gwo ogw‚Äôokukwatibwa LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE bwe gukendeera nokugemebwa omulundi omulala, osobola okufuluma wabweru n‚Äôobeera ng'oli mumalirivu, eyeewuunyisa.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Kondomu, PrEP, nokwegemesa omulundi omulala: Lyettu elyawamu üì¶
cards.text: Kondomu, PrEP, nokwegemesa omulundi omulala bye bimu ku ddiiru y‚Äôobukuumi eyamba okutumbula obulamu bwo mu by‚Äôokwegatta n‚Äôomubiri.
cards.fact:
Kondomu ziyamba okutangira endwadde z‚Äôekikaba okusaasaana. Okumira PrEP kikulemesa okukwatibwa akawuka ka siriimu. Enkola zino ez‚Äôokuziyiza endwadde z‚Äôekikaba bwe zikozesebwa wamu oba nga zaawuddwamu, zikuuma obulamu bwo obw‚Äôokwegatta.
Okufuna  doozi yokwegemesa omulundi omulala buli luvannyuma lwa myezi 6 nakyo kigasa obulamu bwo, anti kyongeza abaserikale bwo okulwanyisa LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE.
Bw‚Äôoba omira PrEP, tewali bukakafu bulaga nti kwegemesa omulundi omulala LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE Kijja kontaana ne PrEP.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Towuumula singa toli  mugeme mu bujjuvu üíâ
cards.text: Ddoozi endala eyokugema esobola okuyamba okwongera ku busimu obuziyiza endwadde n‚Äôokuzzaawo obukuumi okuva ku ddoozi z‚Äôokugema ezasooka eziyinza okuba nga zakendeera okumala ekiseera.
cards.fact:
Obusimu obuziyiza endwadde okuva mu ddoozi zo ezisookerwako buggwaawo okumala ekiseera.
Okufuna Ddoozi endala eyokwegemesa buli luvannyuma lwa myezi 6 kyongeza abaserikale b‚Äôomubiri n‚Äôobutakwatibwa LUMIIMA MAWUGGWE.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Oops! Huwag munang magsaya.ü§ê
cards.text:
Hindi pa tapos ang pandemya. üòØüòß  Ang Covid19 ay nandito pa.üíÄ‚ò†Ô∏è
Ngayon, meron na tayong magagawa para sa ating kaligtasan at sa kaligtasan ng ating mga mahal sa buhay.
cards.fact:
Araw-araw, sa buong Canada, may mga nag popositibo pa din sa Covid19. 
Ang bilang ng nagpopositibo sa Covid19 ay pabago-bago: minsan mababa, minsan tumataas, minsan walang pagbabago, ngunit may mga nagkakasakit at namamatay pa din sa Covid19. 
Hindi nga ito kasindami noong kasagsagan ng pandemya ngunit maari pa ding magkasakit at mamamatay dito.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: Mga araw-araw na kasuotan. üëóüëñüòéüò∑
cards.text: Maaari pa ding magsuot ng mask sa publikong lugar. Huwag manghusga kapag may mga tao pa ding nag susuot ng mask.
cards.fact:
Ang pag suot ng mask ay hinihikayat pa din ng gobyerno ng Canada  lalo na sa pampublikong lugar, sa mga matataong okasyon lalo na pag may matatanda kagaya ng retirement homes, at sa mga kulob na lugar na walang magandang bentilasyon.
Ang pagsuot ng mask ay personal na desisyon. Ito ay dapat nating isaalang-alang at igalang.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Manghikayat para sa kaligtasan ng lahat ü§≥
cards.text: Ang mga kabataan ay may malaking maitutulong para sa pagpapalaganap ng tamang impormasyon tungkol sa Covid19. Pag ang impormasyong ito ay nailagay  ninyo sa inyong social media, maaring makakatulong ito para maiangat ang kaligtasan ng iba.
cards.fact:
Mga 60% ng Gen Z at Millennials ay may alam tungkol sa mga 'Fake news' or balitang gawa-gawa lamang tungkol sa Covid19.  At merong 44% ang may kakayahang mag palaganap ng siyentipikong impormasyon sa social media.  
 Kaya malaki ang maitutulong ng mga kabataan sa pagpapalaganap ng tama at wastong impormasyon sa social media, lalo na tungkol sa dagdag bakuna o booster shot kontra Covid19.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Pamayanan = Kaligtasan sa sakit  üëåüëç
cards.text: Ang mga kabataan ay may kakayahang manguna upang mapalaganap ang kahalagahan ng dagdag bakuna. Meron silang kapangyarihan na hikayatin ang karamihan para sa kanilang kaligtasan.
cards.fact:
Marami pa ding mga tao ang nag aatubiling magpa-bakuna noong 2021 at 2022. 
Kung maipalaganap natin ang kahalagahan ng bakuna sa ating mga kaibigan, lalo na ang dagdag bakuna, maaring maitaas natin ang bilang ng mga taong magpapabakuna, lalo na ang may mga agam-agam at takot sa dagdag bakuna.
Mahal natin ang ating mga kaibigan kaya kailangan nating kausapin sila tungkol dito.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Palakasin ang kalusugan, itaas ang katiyakan  üÜô‚¨ÜÔ∏èüîù
cards.text: Kung ikaw ay nagpa-dagdag bakuna, nagiging mapanatag at tiyak ka sa iyong kaligtasan.
cards.fact:
Ang mga taong may kompletong bakuna, lalo na ang may dagdag bakuna, ay hindi nababahala o nangangamba (13%) at walang depresyon (17%).
Ang proteksyon sa Covid19 ay nakakatulong sa kalusugang pangkaisipan.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Anong oras na? Shot-o-clock!  üíâüëç
cards.text: Mas masaya ang pagtitipon-tipon (lalo na sa gabi) kung may dagdag bakuna dahil hindi ka nababahala na mahawa ng Covid19.
cards.fact:
Ang proteksyon ng bakuna ay bumababa sa loob ng panahon. 
Para patuloy kang ligtas, panatilihin na kompleto ang bakuna at dagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan o mas madalas lalo na sa mga may mababa ang resistensya sa katawan.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Huwag magpatuso ü§¶ maging bakunado üôã‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
cards.text: Huwag hayaang magkasakit ang iyong kaibigan. Hikayatin silang mag dagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan para sa kanilang kaligtasan.
cards.fact:
Mga 80% ng mga kabataan sa Canada ang nakatanggap ng kompletong bakuna, ngunit mababa pa sa 10% ang nag karoon ng dagdag bakuna sa nakaraang anim na buwan.
Hikayatin ang inyong mga kaibigan na magpa-dagdag bakuna.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Huli ka sa 4K üì∏üëÄ
cards.text: Tawagan ang inyong mga kaibigan at tanungin kung sila ba ay nakapag-dagdag bakuna sa Covid19 sa nagdaang anim na buwan dahil maaring bumaba na ang kanilang resistensya ngayon kontra Covid19.
cards.fact:
Madali lang mag karoon ng dagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan. Kung may mga kaibigan kang hindi pa nakapag-dagdag bakuna, turuan mo sila kung paano mag karoon nito. 
Ang kailangan lamang ay ang kanilang personal na impormasyon, ang health card, at ang kompletong paunang bakuna sa Covid19.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Sugpuin ang bayrus (virus) üëä, palakasin ang katawan üí™
cards.text: Patayin ang bayrus! Ang dagdag bakuna sa Covid19 ay nagbibigay ng mas matinding resistensya sa ating katawan.
cards.fact:
Pag nakaranas ng sakit na Covid19, maaring mag karoon ng resistensya dito.
Ngunit ang dagdag bakuna pagkatapos mag kasakit sa Covid 19 ay lalong nagpapaigting ng proteksyon sa ating katawan.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Huwag hayaang humina ang katawan üò∞
cards.text: Kapag walang dagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan, bumababa ang iyong resistensya kontra Covid19. Maari kang mahawa ulit. Huwag hayaan ito!
cards.fact:
Ang resistensya na nakuha mo sa unang bakuna kontra Covid19 ay bumababa sa paglipas ng panahon. 
Para mapanatili na mataas ang resistensya ng katawan, kailangan ang dagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan. 
Ito ay makakatulong din na maiwasan ang matinding sintomas ng Covid19 kung sakaling mahawa ulit nito.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Hikayatin ang lahat üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶üë™
cards.text: Para mahikayat ang iyong mga kaibigan, ikaw mismo ay magpa-dagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan.
cards.fact:
Ang pagdagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan ay makatulong para mapanatili na ligtas ka sa matinding sakit ng Covid19. 
Pag may dagdag bakuna o booster shot, mas malayo na mahawaan ka ng Covid19. Mas kampante ka na makalabas at makipagsaya kasama ng iba.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Ang Condoms, PrEP at dagdag bakuna: kompletong panangga üíè
cards.text: Ang paggamit ng condoms, PrEP, at dagdag bakuna ay magkakasamang proteksyon para mapanatili na ligtas ang katawan lalo na sa mga sakit galing gawaing sekswal.
cards.fact:
Ang condom ay proteksyon laban sa paglaganap ng sekswal na sakit. Ang PrEP ay mga gamot na iniinom para hindi agad mahawaan ng HIV. Pagginamit ng sabay o kahit isa dito, ay malaking tulong para maproteksyonan ang katawan sa sakit na sekswal. 
Ang pagdagdag bakuna kada anim na buwan kontra Covid19 ay nakakatulong para sa dagdag kaligtasan.
 Ang pag inom ng PrEP ay walang epekto sa dagdag bakuna kontra Covid19.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Huwag maging kampante pag walang dagdag bakuna üíâ
cards.text: Ang dagdag bakuna ay nakakatulong upang maitaas ang kalusugan at mapanatiling ligtas sa Covid19.
cards.fact:
Ang resistensya sa mga paunang bakuna ay humuhina sa paglipas ng panahon.
Ang pagdagdag bakuna tuwing anim na buwan ay nakakatulong para maitaas muli ang resistensya at mapapanatiling ligtas sa sakit na Covid19.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Bamba kudvumisa kwakho‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Sisengakayishayi ingcatfu kwanyalo üèÉ Sifo  seCOVID-19 sisekhona solo kusemandleni etfu kutsi sitivikele futsi siphindze sivikele labo lesibatsandzako.
cards.fact:
Bantfu eveni lonkhe le Canada basatihlola kutfolakale kutsi solo basitfola sifo seCOVID-19 onkhe Malinga.
 Sisahamba tigaba tekwehla, nekwenyuka nekuba ncono kwelinani lebantfu lelitfola iCOVID-19 nalabafako.
Linani akusasilo lelisetulu njengase kucaleni lesifo sisesibi, kusenekwenteka sikugulise futsi.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: Timphahla telilanga: üò∑üéΩüëñüëüüëì
cards.text: Akube injwayelo kugcoka sifonyo masiselinyentini. Ungacabangi nobe uhlulele mawubona labanye bagcoke sifonyo njengetimphahla telusuku.
cards.fact:
Sifonyo sisafakwa emtsetfweni wahhulumende wase Canada, ikakhulu masisetindzaweni letisetjentiswa sive,  ticukwini njenga emakhaya lakuhlala bantfu labadzala labadla impenisheli, eticukwini noma etindzaweni lakungashayi umoya kahle.
Sifonyo uyatikhetsela kusigcoka, kumcokwa kuhlonipha tincumo talabanye bantfu.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Bani ngumgcugcuteli wekuvikela umtimba wakho ü§≥
cards.text: Bantfu labasha badlala lichaza lelikhulu ekuhambiseni tindzaba teCOVID-19. Kusebentisa noma kufaka lokutsite etindzaweni tekuchumana kuyamkhutsata lomunye kutsi anakelele imphilo yakhe.
cards.fact:
Kulinganiselwa emashumini lasitfupha 60% we Gen Z na Millenials letting tindzaba letingasiwo emaciniso mayelana neCOVID-19, kuphindze kulinganiselwe emashumini labane nakune 44% batimisele kwabela ngelwati lebucwephesha etinkhundleni tekuchumana.
Ngekwabelana etinkhundleni tekuchumana, insha idlala licaza lelikhulu kuhambisa imilayeto lengiyo nangelwati lekujova.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Umphakatsi = umgcugcuteli wekugoma üåéüí™
cards.text: Bantfu labasha kumele babe mahlahlandlela etindzabeni tekugoma. Banemandla ekwenteni lushintjo nekushintja timphilo talabo labasedvute nabo!
cards.fact:
Linyenti lebantfu laba nako kungabata kugoma makugoywa ngemnyaka wa2021 na 2022
 Kuhambisa emaciniso kubangani mayelana nekungabata, kuyabakhutsata kutsi bayewugoma baphindze batsatse nema-boosters.
 Lokukhulumisana kumcokwa kuba nebantfu labakunakelako ngoba babeka imphilo yabo embili.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Tfutfukisa imphilo yakho, tfutfukisa kutetsemba kwakho üöÄ
cards.text: Magoma nge-booster shot, imphilo yemtimba wakho nengcondvo kuba ngulokuvikelekile.
cards.fact: Bantfu laba goma balishumi nakutsatfu 13% laba khatsateke kancane bese babalishumi nesikhombisa 17% labakhatsekile kunalabo labanganalutfo.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Ngubani sikhatsi manje? i-Shot-o-clocküíâü§™
cards.text: Kuphuma nobe kulala ngaphandle kuncono nawuyitsetse i-booster shot ngobe uyati kutsi ematfuba mancane kutsi utfole sifo se-COVID-19.
cards.fact:
Kutivikela kungancipha emva kwesikhatsi ngemuva kwekutsi wente tonkhe tigaba tekugoma. 
Kute ucedze lonkhe luhlelo lwekugoma kwakho, kumele utfole i-booster shot njalo emvakwe tinyanga letisitfupha, futsi kungaba Kalinga mangabe umtimba wakho awukhoni kutivikela etifeni.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Kusukela ku-busted ü§¶ kuya ku-boosted üíÅ
cards.text: Ungavumeli bangani bakho babe-busted. Bakhumbute kutsi batfole i-booster shot njalo emvakwetinyanga letisitfupha bagomile, ngoba kuvekeleka kwemtimba kuyancipha emvakwesikhatsi.
cards.fact: Kulingaliselwa emashumini lasiphohlongo ekhulwini 80% insha yeCanada lesisigomile sacedza tonkhe tigaba tekugoma, kepha bancane balishumi ekhulwini 10% lasebagomile nge-booster shot kuletinyanga letisitfupha latencies.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Ubanjwe 4K üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Buta bangani bakho kutsi ngabe sebayitfolile yini i-booster shot kuletinyanga letisitfupha letisitfupha bagoma, ngoba umjovo labagome ngaye uyancipha emtimbeni emvakwe sikhatsi.
cards.fact:
Kulula kuhlela kugoma nge-booster shot  emva kwetinyanga letisitfupha ugomile. Uma bangani bakho basengakagomi nge-booster, bakhombise kutsi kulula kanjani kuhlela lilanga lekuyotfola i-booster.
Udzinga kutsi ubenelwati kabanti, libhuku lakho lasemtfolamphilo, nesifakazelo sekutsi sotigomele tonkhe tigaba tekugoma kwakho.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Gcoba ligciwane, vikela emasotja emtimba üéÆ
cards.text: Bulala ligciwane! Emva kwekutfola i-COVID-19, i-booster shot ikunika kuvikeleka kwemasotja  emtimba lokuningi.
cards.fact:
Emva kwekululama kuCOVID-19, USA nesikhatsi sekutsi ugome.
Kepha, kutsatsa i-booster shot emva kwekululama kuleligciwane kubese kukunika kuvikeleka lokuphindziwe emtimbeni wakho.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Ungabuyeli endzaweni yakho yekutalwa kabushaüëæ üéÆ
cards.text: Uma ungayitfoli i-booster shot emva kwetinyanga letisitfupha ugomile, uba sengotini nasematfubeni lasetulu ekutfoleni iCOVID-19. Ungabuyeli emuva!
cards.fact:
Kuvikeleka kwemasotja emtimba lokutfolako emjoveni logome ngawo uyancipha emvakwesikhatsi.
Kuchubeka uvikeleke nemasotja akho emtimba abe ngulasetulu kute ungateyitfola i-COVID-19, i-booster shot iyadzingeka emvakwetinyanga letisitfupha ugomile.
I-booster shot ikuvikela wena kutsi nobe uyitfola i-COVID-19 ingakugulisi ute ulaliswe esibhedlela.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Khulisa indlu phansi üë¢
cards.text: Yati liciniso titfutfukise ngeku tfola i-booster shot njalo emva kwetinyanga letisitfupha ugomile. Tigcine uphephile.
cards.fact:
Ungakhutsata emasotja emtimba, utivikele kutsi kube ngulogula uze ulaliswe esibhedlela uma unetimphawu te-COVID-19 tfola i-booster shot njalo emvakwetinyanga letisitfupha ugomile.
Uma ematfuba ekutfola i-COVID-19 ehla nge-booster shot ungaphumela ebaleni ubenesibindzi, futsi utichenye.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Lijazi lemkhwenyane, i-PrEP, ne booster shots: Kusuke kuphelele koknhe üì¶
cards.text: Lijazi Lemkhwenyane, i-PrEP ne booster shots usuke uphephe ngalokuphelele iyatfutfuka imphilo yakho ngetekulalana ngasecansini nasemtimbeni.
cards.fact:
ijazi Lemkhwenyane lisita kuvikela kwandza kwetifo tanga sense. Kutsatsa i-PrEP kukuvikela wena ekutfoleni iHIV. Kukusentisa konkhe kanye kanye, nome eceleni letinhlelo tekuvikela tifo tasecansini netindlela tekuvikela wena netemphilo takho ngetekulalana.
Kutfola i-booster shot njalo emvakwetinyanga letisitfupha kuyakusita kutemphilo, kukhulisa kuvikeleka kwemasotja emtimba elulweni ne-COVID-19.
Nawutsatsa i-PrEP, kute sifakazelo kutsi i-COVID-19 booster shot bese ayisebentisani kahle nePrEP.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Ungakhatsateki uma ungakagomi ngalokuphelele üíâ
cards.text: I-booster shot iyasita kukhulisa kuvikeleka kwemasotja emtimba phindze kubuyise kuvikeleka  lobesekuncipha bemjovo lowagoma ngawo emvakwasikhatsi.
cards.fact:

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Poko bat bravo ‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Nou poko fini üèÉ Pandemi COVID-19 la ap kontinye toujou men nou gen mwayen pou nou pwoteje tet nou avek moun pwoch nou tou.
cards.fact:
Moun tout kote nan Canada toujou ap teste pozitif toujou pou COVID-19 chak jou.
Nou toujou ap gen peryod kote li diminye, ogmante, epi stabilite nan kantite nou enfeksyon COVID-19 avek lanmo tou.
 Malgre chif yo pa wo jan yo te konn wo leu pandemi tap frape fo, li posib toujou pou ka malad.

cards.text: Li toujou nomal toujou pou mete mask nan espas piblik. Pa pense oswa jije leu nou we lot moun mete mask avek rad yo.
cards.fact:
Leta Kanadyen an kontinye ankouraje tilizasyon mask, sitou nan espas piblik, nan kay kote gwoup moun ap viv tankou kay pou retrete, ak nan espas ki gen foul moun oswa kote van pa sikile byen.
Pendan ke utilize mask la se on chwa pesonel, li enpotan pou respekte chwa lot moun.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Se on enfliyanse iminite ü§≥
cards.text: Jeunes jwe on rol kle nan pataje enfomasyon COVID-19. Leu ou poste, ou ka rezon ke on moun amelyore sante li

Leu ou pataje sou rezo sosyal, la jeunes ka on kle nan pwopaje enfomasyon ki bon ak ki ankouraje moun pou piki rapel la.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Kominote = Iminite üåéüí™
cards.text: La jeunes kapab dirije lit la pou nomalize piki rapel yo. Yo gen posibilite pou  enfliyanse epi fe on diferans nan lavi moun nan antouraj yo.

Anpil moun ezite pran vaksen an leu li te fek ap soti an 2021 ak 2022 a.
Pataje fe yo avek zanmi kap ezite ka ankouraje yo pou yo pran vaksen ak nenpot ki piki rapel yo bezwen.
Li enpotan pou gen konvesasyon sa yo avek moun ki enpotan pou nou paske sante yo gen vale pou nou.

Moun ki vaksine 13% mwens enkye ak gen 17% mwens depresyon ke sa ki pa vaksine yo.
Pwoteksyon kont COVID-19 aide sante mantal ou.

cards.title: Kileu li ye? Leu Vaksen üíâü§™

Pou ka konpletman ajou avek vaksen ou, fok ou pran on piki rapel chak 6 mwa, peutet menm plis si ou gen pwoblem iminite.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Chung ane mor mari ‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Pok wachopo e giko üèÉCorona pod nitiere kendo wan gi teko kod nyalo mar ritore wawegi kendo rito jogo ma wahero.
cards.fact:
Ji mawuok e piny Canada pod iyudo kod tuo mar Corona odiochieng kodiochieng mopimgi. Pod wadhi nyime kawaneno dok chien, medruok kod bedo makare eyor tuo mar Corona matucho manyien kod tho.  
 Kata obedo ni kwan ok ni malo ahinya kaka diere mane corona ochakore, pod en gima nyalore ni inyalo bedo matuo.

cards.name: Arihant Boli
cards.title: Rwakruok mar odiochieng: üò∑üéΩüëñüëüüëì
cards.text: Ote machuok. Pod en gima kare rwako abuog rombe e dier oganda kata kuma ji nitiere. Kik ikawe matin kata jaro jok moko ka ineno ka girwako abuog rombe kaka achiel kuom yor rwakruok margi.
cards.fact: Tiyo kod abuog rombe en gino ma pod ijiwo kod serikal mar piny Canada, to moloyo e dier oganda e kuonde chokruoge, kuonde ma ji odakie kaka kuma jogo ma otieko tich yueyoe, kod kuonde ma opong kod ji kata onge yamo makadhe maber. Kata obedo ni tiyo kod abuog rombe en yiero mar ng'ato owuon, en gima ber luoro yiero mar jomoko.

cards.name: Fernanda Galvis
cards.title: Thor mar Ote. Bed ng'ano ma jiwo yore rateke mag del  ü§≥
cards.text: Rawere timo tich makare mar wacho weche Korona. Sama ioro weche go eyor mbui, inyalo miyo ng'ama chielo bedo kod ngima maber.
cards.fact: Machiegni ji 60% ma Gen Z kod Millenials ong'eyo malong'o weche go ma ok odhi kare kata mag miriambo kuom korona, kendo atamalo 44 oyie kendo oikore mar keyo wechego e mbui kata yore tudruok mag oganda.

cards.name: Leo Mao
cards.title: Gweng' = Rateke üåéüí™
cards.text: Jogo matindo nyalo telo ne yor nwang'o chanjo makare. Gin kod nyalo mar rocho kata lombo jogo man kodgi machiegni mondo olok ngimagi.
cards.fact:
Ji mang'eny kaloe luoro mar kawo chanjo nyaka ne wach chanjo chakre e higa 2021 kod 2022. 
 Poro weche ma adiera kod osiepe moluor kawo chanjo, miyo gi mijing'o mar dhi dwaro chanjo kod yor chanjo moro amora machielo madwarore. 
 Wechegi ber wacho kod jogo ma wahero kendo mawarito nikech wahero ngimagi.

cards.name: Amrita Mohammed
cards.title: Jiw kit ngima, jiw bedo gi chir mari üöÄ
cards.text: Ka iyudo chanjo mar ariyo, inyalo bedo kod chir ni ngima ni mapile kod mar obuongo oriti.
cards.fact:
Jogo ma ochanji ok nigi luoro e atamalo 13% kendo ok kale weche paro mang'eny ga ata malo 17% kaka jogo ma ok ochanji. 
 Bedo gi ritruok makare ne tuo mar Korona konyo e ngimani mar paro kata mar obuongo.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: En saa adi? Saa mar yudo chanjoüíâü§™
cards.text: Bedo oko e otieno achiel ber ka iyuod chanjo mar ariyo nikech ok yot mondo mi iyud Korona.
cards.fact:
Arita nyalo dok chien kuom kinde moko bang yudo chanjo mamoko. 
 Mondo mi ibed e opara manyime gi yore chanjo, nyaka iyud chanjo mamoko bang dueche uchiel ka dueche auchiel, kendo kaber to mang'eny ne mano ka rateke mag dendi tin.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Kowuok e koso chanjo ü§¶ nyaka bedo gi chanjo mar ariyo üíÅ
cards.text: Kik iwe osiepe gi kos chanjo. parnegi mondo mi giyud chanjo gi mamoko bang dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel, nikech rateke mag del dok chien kuom kinde moko.
cards.fact:
Madirom 80% mag rowere kata jogo matindo ma Kanada oseyudo chanjo gi tee motieko, to matin ne 10% oseyudo chanjo kendo e dueche auchiel mokalo.
 Parne osiepegi mondo oyud chanjogi mar ariyo.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Omaki e 4K üì∏üìâ
cards.text: Luong osiepegi kapok giyudo chanjo margi mar ariyo e dueche auchiel mokalo, nikech rateke mag del dok chien kuom kinde
cards.fact:
En gino mayot chano kata pango mar yudo chanjoni mar ariyo bang' dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel. Ka osiepegi pok oyudo margi to nyisgi kaka en gima yot loso romo. 
 Idwaro mana ni ibed kod weche gi kata nonroni, kadi mari mar thieth kod chanjo mane iyudo mokuongo to itieko.

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Thir kute, med rateke mag dendi üéÆ
cards.text: Tiek kute! Bang yudo Korona kata COVID-19, chanjo mar ariyo nyalo miyo ibed gi rateke mag del mathoth.
cards.fact:
Bang ka isechango tok yudo Korona, in kod kinde mar duogo rateke mag dendi. 
 Kata kamano, yudo chanjo mar ariyo bang chango kuom kute miyo ibedo gi arita momedore.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Wek dok chien e gima nyalo miyo iyud kute kendo üëæüéÆ
cards.text: Ka ok iyud chanjo mari tok dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel, to ibedo e thuolo mar yudo Korona kata COVID-19 kendo. Wek dok chien!
cards.fact:
Rateke mag del ma iyudo tok chanjo mari mokuongo dok ga chien kata rumo kuom kinde moko. 
 Mondo mi idhi nyime bedo kod rateke mag del e okang mamalo mondo mi kik iyud COVID-19 kata Korona, dwarore ni mondo iyud chanjo to dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel. 
 Chanjo masanja no endo bende biro konyi kik ibed matuo ahinya kaponi iyudo Korona kata COVID-19 kendo.

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Kony ot oyud chanjo üë¢
cards.text: Bed gi jogo ma yudo chanjo tok dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel. Med bedo gi hero mar timo kamano.
cards.fact:
Inyalo medo rateke mag dendi kendo geng'o bedo matuo ahinya sama iyudo COVID-19 ka iyudo chanjo bang dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel.  
 Sama iduoko chien nyalo mar yudo COVID-19 kuom yudo chanjo, inyalo dhi oko kendo bedo gi chir kod mor kuomi iwuon.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Rabo oyunga, PrEP kod chanjo: Magi e yore go mantie üì¶
cards.text: Rabo oyunga, PrEP kod chanjo gin e yorego mantiere mag geng'ruok mondo ibed gi ngima makare mar terruok kod ngima mapile.
cards.fact:
Rabo oyunga konyo eyor geng'o landruok mar tuoche mag nyeye (STIs). Muonyo yath mar PrEP konyi mondo kik iyud kute mag ayaki. Ka itiyo kodgi kanyakla achiel kata mopogore, yore geng'o tuoche mag nyeyegi konyi e rito ngimani mar terruok. 
 Yudo chanjo bang dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel bende konyi e yor medo rateke mag dendi kuom yudo COVID-19. 
 Ka imuonyo PrEP, onge neno moromo ma nyiso ni chanjo mari mar COVID-19 nyalo ruwore gi PrEP.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Wek galori kapok itieko chanjo üíâ
cards.text: Chanjo masanja nyalo medo rateke magi mag del kendo duoko arita mari mar chanjo mokuongo ma nyalo bedo ni osedok chien kuom kinde.
cards.fact:
Rateke mari kuom chanjo mokuongo dok chien kata rumo kuom kinde moko. 
 Yudo chanjo bang dueche auchiel ka dueche auchiel medo rateke magi mag del kendo omiyo ok inyal yudo COVID-19 eyo mayot.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

cards.name: Ernesto Poleo
cards.title: Ngatimbomirai kupemberera hedu.‚ùåüëè
cards.text: Hatisati tasvika pekupedzisira, denda re COVID-19 nekuti richiri kubata vakawanda vedu uyezve tine simba rekuzvichengetedza isu nevadikanwi vedu.
cards.fact:
Vanhu mu Canada varikubatwa vaine denda re COVID-19 zuva roga roga. 
 Tirimunguva yekudzikira kwe denda,kuwedzera uyezve  nekugadzikana muhuwandu hwevarikubatwa parizvino nedenda iri. 
 Tiri kuona huwandu husina kunyanyisa kuwanda nezvakanga zvakaita pakutangwa kwe denda iri, zvinokwanisikwa kuti unogona kurwara

cards.fact: Masiki ichiri kukurudzirwa nehurumende yeCanada, kunyanya munzvimbo dzinoungana dzemukati dzinoungana vanhu, vanogara vakawanda zvakafanana nezvimbo dzigara vasisaenda kubasa nezimwewo nzvimbo dzinoungana uye dzisingafambe mhepo zvakasununguka.

cards.fact:
Vanosvika 60% ye Gen Z neve Mellenials vaneruzivo rwenhau dzenhema maringe ne COVID-19, uyezve 44% vakazvipira kupa mashoko e sainzi pama sai sai  nenhepfenyuro. 
 Kupa mashoko pa ma sai sai ,vechidiki vankwanisa kuva vakakosha mukupana nevamwe zvinotarisirwa uyezve kukurudzira mashoko anechekuita ne zve kukurudzira pfuti yekudzivirira.

cards.fact:
Vanhu vakawanda nevaneruzivo rwekuzeza mushonga wakatanga kupihwa muna 2021 nemuna 2022. 
 Kupana mashoko nevaneruzivo neshamwari dzevechidiki  vanozeza kuno kurudzira 
  mushonga wekudzivirira uyezve ne kurudziro yedziviriro. 
 Nyaya idzi dzinokurudzirwa nevanhu vanerudo nekuti vanokoshesa hutano hwavo.

cards.name: Ashely Bato
cards.title: Inguvai? pfuti yechiringazuva üíâü§™
cards.text: Kuenda panze kwakanaka kana wakawana mushonga we kurudziro yepfuti yedziviriro nekuti  mukana mushoma wekubatira COVID-19.
cards.fact:
Chengetedzo tinokwanisa kuiwana panguva yakatirebeyi mushure mekuwana mushongwa wekudziriva. 
 Kuti ukwanise kuva wakawana mushonga yese yekudzivirira,unofanirwa kuwana nhomba yedziviriro mwedzi hwenhanhatu woga woga asi kana tapata yako isina kusimba unofanirwa kuuya mumwaka mupfupi woga woga.

cards.name: Waleed Zafar Virk
cards.title: Kubva kusarongeka ü§¶ uchipinda mukurudziro üíÅ
cards.text: Rega shamwari dzako dzibviswe. Vayeuchidze kuti vapfure avo mwedzi mitanhatu yega yega, sezvo kusadzivirirwa kunopera nekufamba kwenguva.
cards.fact:
Vanosvika makumi masere muzana muzana vevadiki veCanada vakaita kuti yavo yekutanga vaccinations ipedzwe, asi isingasviki gumi muzana vakagamuchira chikwiriso chakapfurwa mumwedzi mitanhatu yadarika. 
 Yeuchidza shamwari dzako kuti dziwane bhutsu yavo.

cards.name: Tad Chmiel
cards.title: Yakadzidziswa mu4K üì∏ üìâ
cards.text: Daidza shamwari dzako kunze kana vasina kuwana yavo yekuwedzera pfuti mumwedzi mitanhatu yadarika, sezvo yekudzivirira yekudzivirira inopfeka nekufamba kwenguva
cards.fact:
Zviri nyore kuronga kuti yako nyowani ipfurwe mwedzi mitanhatu yega yega. Kana shamwari dzako dzisina kuwana yavo, dziratidze kuti zviri nyore sei kubhuka musangano. 
 Iwe unongoda ruzivo rwako pachako, kadhi rako rehutano, uye yako yekutanga vaccin yakapera

cards.name: Beren Sezgin
cards.title: Nerf hutachiona, buff immune yako üéÆ
cards.text: Paradza hutachiona! Mushure mekuwana COVID-19, pfuti inosimudzira inogona kukupa kunyange kudzivirirwa kwakawanda
cards.fact:
Mushure mekupora kubva kuCovid-19, iwe une hwindo rekusadzivirirwa. 
 Nekudaro, kuwana booster kupfura mushure mekupora kubva kuhutachiona kunopa kunyange kuwedzera kuchengetedzwa.

cards.name: Sabah Rahman
cards.title: Usadzokera kune yako yekufema point üëæ üéÆ
cards.text: Paunenge usingatore yako nyowani kupfura mwedzi mitanhatu yega yega, iwe unowedzera kuve panjodzi yekubvumirana COVID-19. Usadzokera!
cards.fact:
Iyo immune system yaunogamuchira kubva kune yako yekutanga yekudzivirira doses inopfeka nekufamba kwenguva. 
 Kuti uenderere mberi uine yakakwirira yekudzivirirwa kubva pakuyedza yakanaka ye COVID-19, pfuti inosimudzira inodiwa mwedzi mitanhatu yega yega. 
 Yako booster kupfura zvakare inokudzivirira kubva kune zvakanyanya kuomarara zviratidzo kana iwe ukaita chibvumirano COVID-19

cards.name: Mike Hannagan
cards.title: Boost imba pasi üë¢
cards.text: Shumira kwakawedzera baddie realness nekuita kuti yako nyowani ipfure mwedzi mitanhatu yega yega. Ramba uchityisa.
cards.fact:
Iwe unogona kuwedzera simba rako rekudzivirira uye uzvidzivirire kubva kune yakasimba COVID-19 zviratidzo nekuita kuti yako nyowani ipfure mwedzi mitanhatu yega yega. 
 Kana mukana wako wekubvumirana COVID-19 yakaderera neyekuwedzera pfuti, unogona kubuda uye uve chivimbo chako, chinoshamisa pachako.

cards.name: Shivam Amati
cards.title: Makondomu, PrEP, uye booster shots: Iva iyo yakazara package üì¶
cards.text: Makondomu, PrEP, uye booster shots chikamu chehomwe yekudzivirira iyo inovandudza hutano hwako hwepabonde uye hwepanyama
cards.fact:
Makondomu anobatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwe STIs. Kutora PrEP kunokumisa kubva mukubvumirana nehutachiona. Inoshandiswa pamwe chete kana zvakasiyana, idzi STI nzira dzekudzivirira dzinochengetedza hutano hwako hwepabonde. 
 Kuwana booster kupfura yega yega mwedzi mitanhatu kunobatsirawo hutano hwako, sezvo ichimutsa kusadzivirirwa kwako kubva ku COVID-19. 
 Kana iwe uri kutora PrEP, hapana humbowo hwekuti yako COVID-19 booster pfuti inosangana nePrEP.

cards.name: Haran Havilah
cards.title: Usaregedze kana isina kunyatso zadzikiswa üíâ
cards.text: Booster shots inogona kubatsira kuwedzera kusadzivirirwa uye kudzoreredza kuchengetedzwa kubva kune yekutanga yekudzivirira doses iyo inogona kunge yakadzikira nekufamba kwenguva.
cards.fact:
Kudzivirirwa kubva kune yako yekutanga doses inopfeka nekufamba kwenguva. 
 Kuwana booster kupfura yega yega mwedzi mitanhatu kunowedzera kusadzivirirwa kwako uye kunoita kuti zvisakwanise kuita chibvumirano COVID-19.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.

data.bannerText: COVID-19 is affecting communities globally at different cycles and waves. We are a Canadian charity making information about COVID-19 accessible to everyone in multiple languages. Our creative content is based on information provided by the World Health Organization (WHO) and supports the call to action by the United Nations for such information to reach everywhere. So, please share these multilingual images using a social media platform of your choice and help the world stay safe.
